section.title: What's Included?
section.para:
This binary release includes:
cassandra: Contains the script for creating the Cassandra Keyspace.
docs: Contains all relevant documentation in respective subfolders.
jboss-5.1.0.GA: The core server with two profiles "default" and "simulator". The "default" profile is a clean profile where you will have to start from scratch and configure the entire SS7 Stack and SMSC Gateway. The "simulator" profile is a pre-configured profile to work with jss7-simulator.
resources: Contains SLEE MAP
tools: Contains SLEE tools and jss7-simulator.

formalpara.title: GUI Management Console
formalpara.para: &THIS.PLATFORM; &THIS.APPLICATION; now comes with a Graphical User Interface that will allow you to configure, monitor and manage the Gateway through a convenient user-friendly interface.

formalpara.title: Performance
formalpara.para: Several improvements have been incorporated to offer high performance.

formalpara.title: Cassandra Database
formalpara.para: &THIS.PLATFORM; &THIS.APPLICATION; stores messages using Cassandra database. You must configure Database settings following the instructions in the documentation.

formalpara.title: CDR logging to text file
formalpara.para: &THIS.PLATFORM; &THIS.APPLICATION; is enabled with CDR logging to a plain text file.

formalpara.title: Support for MAP Version 1
formalpara.para: &THIS.PLATFORM; &THIS.APPLICATION; now supports MAP V1 protocol for both SRI and forwardMT messages.

formalpara.title: SMPP Simulator
formalpara.para: &THIS.PLATFORM; &THIS.APPLICATION; now comes with a GUI Simulator for working with SMSC via SMPP protocol.

formalpara.title: Anonymous incoming BIND and multiple BINDs from same IP
formalpara.para: &THIS.PLATFORM; &THIS.APPLICATION; now allows anonymous incoming BIND request (IP and Port unknown, but SystemId and Password matches) and multiple BINDs from the same IP.

formalpara.title: Additional SMSC Parameters
formalpara.para: You can now configure several additional SMSC Parameters using CLI and GUI.

section.title: Configuration Settings
section.para: You must perform post-installation configuration of the Gateway according to instructions in the &THIS.PLATFORM; &THIS.APPLICATION; Admin Guide. Before using in Production, you must remember to fine-tune Memory, Database and logging settings for better performance.

warning.para: Failure to configure memory, database, logging and other settings as per the instructions in the Admin Guide may result in poor performance of the Gateway.

section.title: Documentation
section.para: When you download the binary release and extract the contents of the zip file, you will notice that the top level directory is named telscale-smsc-<version> and within the telscale-smsc-<version>/docs folder you will find the &THIS.PLATFORM; &THIS.APPLICATION; Installation Guide and User Guide. For installation and usage guidance, please refer to these guides that will help you to install and configure the Gateway.

section.title: Support
section.para: &THIS.PLATFORM; &THIS.APPLICATION; is fully supported by TeleStax. For help with the software or to raise bugs please login to your account at and follow the instructions.
